        getMapComponents

    • Method Detail

      • installCustomSplashScreen

        void installCustomSplashScreen(android.view.View splashView,
                               int orientation)
        Modifies the splash screen based on information directly from the flavor. This will include the splash screen graphic and the associated Text. The provided view is currently the splash screen view instantiated by the core tak application.
        Parameters:
        splashView - the view to modify
        orientation - the orientation of the view

      • hasMilCapabilities

        boolean hasMilCapabilities()
        Returns true if the flavor Supplies Military Capabilities

      • getAssetInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getAssetInputStream(java.lang.String name)
        Allows for an input stream to be constructed from a asset that may or may not be provided by the flavor.
        Parameters:
        name - The location of the file and the name in the asset directory.

      • rolloutActionBars

        void rolloutActionBars()
        Unroll out additional action bars.

      • deployDocumentation

        void deployDocumentation()
        Called when the app in first run or upgraded or when the flavor has changed. This will roll out all user documentation specific to the flavor.

      • deployWMSPointers

        void deployWMSPointers()
        Deploy WMS Pointers specific to the flavor.

      • getFlavorMapComponents

        @Deprecated
MapComponent[] getFlavorMapComponents()
        Deprecated. see MapComponentProvider::getMapComponents
        Load components
